name: sloping
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of a surface) lying at an angle to the horizontal so that some points on it are higher than others: sloping handwriting/shoulders The bedroom is in the attic so it has a sloping ceiling. See
slope
More examplesFewer examplesDorchester Terrace was a row of tall red houses with sloping slate roofs.About 200 people gather on a gently sloping lawn as the President speaks to them from the steps.On the other side of the barn, the ground is sloping.
